nutanix_node_disable_reason_node_already: The node has already been deployed
nutanix_node_disable_reason_node_is_powe: You need to power down the node before completing this action
nutanix_node_disable_reason_node_not_uni: For security reasons, you need to uninstall the node to cancel it
nutanix_node_disable_reason_node_not_ins: An installation needs to be done first
nutanix_node_disable_reason_node_already: This node has already been uninstalled
nutanix_node_disable_reason_cluster_has_: An installation is already in progress on the cluster
nutanix_node_disable_reason_server_is_re: A task is already in progress on the node
nutanix_node_disable_reason_lower_than_i: A Nutanix cluster cannot work with less than {{nb_nodes_minimal}} nodes
